title: ABM Calibration and Validation Report
description: The purpose of the report was to compare the activity-based model with observed survey data. All of the visualizations compare different variables of the model with observed survey data.
data: The data for this report comes from the CMAP ABM 2010/2015 and many surveys completed by CMAP or the Census Bureau. Some of this data is demographic data, such as how many people live in a household and other data includes geographic information.
tools: This project was written using D3.js and Leaflet.js using JavaScript as well as Bootstrap for the layout.
text: Includes instructional text, notes on data and visuals, and narrative for interpreting visuals
staff: Aaron Brown, Brittaney Harkness, Sarah Buchhorn, Joseph Nardi (intern), Craig Heither
